description: Framework to analyse agricultural and resource policies. Role of policy advisor and theories of government regulation. Measuring policy impacts. Analysis of selected agricultural, agri-environmental and resource policies and institutions in Australia and internationally. Global issues in agriculture and agricultural trade. Detailed investigation of a topical policy issue.
incompatible: ECON7964 or AREC7006 or ECON3960 or AREC3001 or AGRC3027
